DOC.brief_title: UW WELL-FIT Exercise Program Cancer Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This study single group pre-test post-test design.There 4 optional measure present participant choose participate . These present check box consent form . After completion University Waterloo ( UW ) WELL-FIT program , participant give option continue exercise program ; offer Graduate Program . Following consent Graduate Program , repeat measure would take annually . At time consent , option data use research . At point involvement exercise base program , indicate `` longer want participate program data collection '' . Their medical care participation UW WELL-FIT program affect . Procedures 1 . UW WELL-FIT advertisement Grand River Regional Cancer Centre 2 . UW WELL-FIT brochure 3 . Referral Form 4 . Participants initial consultation assessment 5 . Obtain consent UW WELL-FIT 6 . Obtain Participant Information 7 . Completion FACIT-F survey 8 . Metabolism & Body Composition - Information sheet optional measure 9 . Physical Activity Survey- Godin Questionnaire 10 . Provide 3-Day food diary Nutritional Assessment 11 . Fitness assessment , exercise programming data entry : 1 . Submaximal cardiovascular cycle ergometer treadmill grade exercise test 2 . Muscular strength use force transducer 3 . Body composition : - Height , weight waist girth - Bioelectrical Impedance Analysis ( BIA ) - Dual Energy X-ray Absorption ( Optional ) 4 . Range motion use goniometer 5 . Blood sampling ( Optional ) 6 . Design Individualized exercise program 12 . UW WELL-FIT - Commencement participant 12 week exercise program ( 2 x 60 minute class ) 13 . Post assessment ( repeat pre-test assessment ) 14 . Pre post data enter database 15 . Summary Feedback Report 16 . Graduate Program : participant selects attend UW WELL-FIT Graduate Program 17 . Participants annual reassessment Graduate Program
DOC.criteria: previously diagnose cancer currently receive form treatment ( chemotherapy , radiation therapy hormonal therapy ) Physical / health factor prohibit exercise lack medical clearance physician
